summary: Konrad Emil Bloch ForMemRS  was a German American biochemist.
full_text:
Konrad Emil Bloch, ForMemRS  was a German American biochemist. Bloch received the Nobel Prize in Medicine or Physiology in 1964  for discoveries concerning the mechanism and regulation of the cholesterol and fatty acid metabolism.
^ Westheimer, F. H.; Lipscomb, W. . "Konrad Bloch. 21 January 1912 - 5 October 2000". Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 48: 43. doi:10.1098/rsbm.2002.0003.
title: Konrad Emil Bloch
